Title: TouchPPT - A Silverlight 4 Multi-touch Application for Presentation
Description: TouchPPT makes it easier for users to navigate through brochures and manuals. It is designed for advertising in public with multi-touch PC monitors.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

TouchPPT makes it easier for users to navigate through brochures and manuals. It is designed for advertising in public with multi-touch PC monitors.

This project is just started. If you would like to participate in the project, please contact the project coordinator by email.

 

 

Acknowledgement

This project uses codes and libs from following projects:

Touch - Multi-Touch Behaviors for Silverlight 3 and WPF 3.5SP1
http://touch.codeplex.com/

Silverlight 4, WPF 4 and Windows Phone 7 Multi-Touch Manipulation
http://multitouch.codeplex.com/
